Producer: Chapin Hall, Naz Kawakami, Jesy Odio, Alika Tengan
Production Co: Teenager, Banana Blossom Pictures, Pacific Islanders in Communications, NMG Network
Synopsis: A young man is determined to give his life meaning outside of Kaimuki, the small Hawaiian town where he grew up, even if it means leaving everything he's ever known and loved behind.
Title: Every Day in Kaimuki
